system.effect:
Trigger: You hit with a Damaging Telekinetic Move or use another Telekinetic Move
Effect: The effect of this Feature depends on the Triggering Move.
- Barrier: Place 2 additional segments of Barrier, and you may place the Barriers anywhere within 6 meters of yourself. They do not need to remain contiguous, nor does one segment have to touch you.
- Kinesis: The user of the triggering attack becomes Confused and Suppressed.
- Meditate: You gain +1 Defense, Special Attack, and Special Defense Combat Stages.
- Psychic: The target becomes Vulnerable for one full round, and may be Pushed 2 additional meters.
- Telekinesis: At the end of each turn that the target remains Lifted, they lose a Tick of Hit Points.
- Twin Beam: You may use of Twin Beam again, ignoring Frequency, against the same or another target in range, although this use of Twin Beam lacks the "Double Strike" keyword.
system.name: Psionic Overload [CR]
